title: I cant start the game.
body: When I try to start the game it tells me that pvp.net patcher  kernel stopped working what do I do? Pls help

replies.body: This error usually indicates a security config that's preventing the patcher from launching.  You should go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to resolve this via adding league as an exception.  I hope that helps!
